Report.Description: SQL view [CustomViewSoftwareLicenseContractReviews] that lists the top five pending contract reviews
Report.SearchSQL: SELECT TOP(5) slcr.[ReviewDateRank] ,slcr.[Name] ,slcr.[VendorName] ,slcr.[LicenseType] ,slcr.[ContractNo] ,slcr.[ContractReviewDate] ,slcr.[DaysTillContractReview] FROM dbo.[CustomViewSoftwareLicenseContractReviews] AS slcr WHERE slcr.[DaysTillContractReview] is not null ORDER BY slcr.ReviewDateRank, slcr.SoftwareLicenseID
